mapper.insert: insert into room ( room_idx, room_title, category_type, room_count, room_region, room_gender, start_datetime, end_datetime, room_longitude,room_latitude, room_content, write_datetime, close_ok, u_nickname, u_idx, final_datetime, begin_datetime) values ( room_seq.nextval, #{room_title}, #{category_type}, #{room_count}, #{room_region}, #{room_gender}, TO_DATE(#{start_datetime},'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_DATE(#{end_datetime}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), #{longitude},#{latitude}, #{room_content}, TO_DATE(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{close_ok}, #{u_nickname}, #{u_idx}, TO_DATE(#{final_datetime}, 'HH24:MI:SS'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: select * from room order by room_idx
select u_nickname from users where u_hash = #{hash}
